alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lafayette; Panola; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette, northern Yalobusha, northwestern Calhoun and southeastern Panola Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 546 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of George Payne State Park, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oxford, Batesville, Water Valley, George Payne State Park, Holly Springs National Forest, Springdale, Burgess, Banner, Tula, Paris, Velma, Taylor, Altus, Shuford, Pine Valley, Eureka Springs and Yocona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
